<< cell2struct data structures cellfun >>

celldisp

Display cell array contents.

Syntax

celldisp(C)
celldisp(C, name)

Input argument

C

cell array.

name

displayed name of cell array.

Description

celldisp recursively display the contents of a cell array.

Example

C = {2, 22, 'ff', {331, 332}};
celldisp(C)
celldisp(C, 'var_name')

See also

disp.

History

Version Description
1.0.0 initial version

Author

Allan CORNET
